item.title: Think for yourself
item.description: I was recommended to explore this topic yet again by [[Steven Gong|Mr. Steven Gong]], I was making a website using [[Quartz|quartz]] to host my [[Obsidian]] notes online and Steven noticed that my website looked awfully similar to his, was this on purpose?

item.title: Work for Want
item.description: What is work for want? A lot of people in today’s world get what they want without doing direct work for it, not to say that you aren’t doing work but let’s say you want something in that specific moment and you have the capability to obtain it then you most likely will obtain it.
